title: Express Talk: Through the Looking Glass
hero_caption: Ellen Emmet Rand. Woman before the Mirror, 1925. Mr. and Mrs. Frederick G. Wacker Jr. Endowment Fund.
short_description: Mirrors are emblems and symbols in the history of art. They reflect the world around us and often the gaze of whomever is on the other side. Join educator Giannella Ysasi to think about ways of seeing and discuss the representation of women throughout the history of art in this 30-minute talk.
description:
Mirrors are emblems and symbols in the history of art. They reflect the world around us and often the gaze of whomever is on the other side. Join educator Giannella Ysasi to think about ways of seeing and discuss the representation of women throughout the history of art in this 30-minute talk.
